name: My Sweet Dorayaki: Tokyo Revenger Mikey Otome Game
name_original: My Sweet Dorayaki: Tokyo Revenger Mikey Otome Game
description:
My Sweet Dorayaki: Featuring Mikey From Tokyo Revengers 

I have been feeling the blues since season 1 finished. So, I hope this fills people with a bit of joy. 

For mac users please use chrome to download. If unable to open or download the game. open system preference then open security and privacy then general then open anyway.

For window users. If unable to open or download the game. open Apps and features then installing apps then allow apps from everywhere.

If you would like to support my games please consider donating in the link.

https://paypal.me/mionharune?locale.x=en_US
